alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 8:36PM EST until March 07 at 9:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EST FOR PASSAIC...NORTHWESTERN ESSEX AND ORANGE COUNTIES... At 835 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lanesville to Hartwood to near Hope to near Emmaus to near Birdsboro, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. These severe storms will be near... Cuddebackville and Otisville around 840 PM EST. Howells around 845 PM EST. Middletown around 850 PM EST. Montgomery around 855 PM EST. Walden around 900 PM EST. Bloomingdale and Fairfield around 905 PM EST. Pompton Lakes around 910 PM EST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
